comment: Gadver! : BREAKING We got reports the crash could be an Airbus A320 Germanwings between Barcelona and Dusseldorf.
amr:
# ::snt Gadver! : BREAKING We got reports the crash could be an Airbus A320 Germanwings between Barcelona and Dusseldorf.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (b / break-13
                  :ARG1 (r / report-01
                        :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                              :ARG1 (c / crash-01
                                    :ARG1 (a / aircraft-type
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Airbus"
                                                :op2 "A320")
                                          :mod (c2 / company
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Germanwings")))
                                    :location (b2 / between
                                          :op1 (c3 / city
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Barcelona"))
                                          :op2 (c4 / city
                                                :name (n4 / name
                                                      :op1 "Dusseldorf")))))))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Gadver"))))
